attachments.pretext: Download a report below to review resources marked as non-compliant against Tag Policies defined by the organization's compliance team

fields.title: Download instruction(CLI)
Download instruction(CLI) Note
fields.value: Make sure to obtain proper credential of the Audit account(also may known as Compliance account) which owns the S3 bucket in order to execute command.

fields.title: Via respective Management Console
fields.value: <https://console.aws.amazon.com/resource-groups/tag-policies/?region=ap-northeast-1#|Effective tag policy and noncompliants> (Make sure to Filter by proper Region)
